name: Pro-Gen City Explorer
description:
Welcome to a procedurally generated city explorer!

The goal of this game is to collect all of the orbs that are located randomly throughout the city. Dodge the cars or end up being forced to try again!

Make use of your abilities to double jump and swing you way through the city with your trusty grappling gun!

If you complete the object or meet your demise, try again with a new prodecurally generated city with new heights and street layout!
